title: Free AI in India? Google, OpenAI and Perplexity are betting your curiosity will train their machines
description:
An artificial intelligence (AI) symbol is seen at a temporary structure of worship called Pandel during the Durga Puja festival in Kolkata, India, on Sept. 25, 2025.

Artificial intelligence companies racing to expand in India are not just chasing customers — they are enlisting millions of users to ...
